categories: Category:Battles of the New Sith Wars

nodes.text: Battle of Brentaal IV  (New Sith Wars)

The Battle of Brentaal IV was the last battle of Kaan's campaign to capture the Bormea sector for the Brotherhood of Darkness. It was an easy Sith victory. It occurred just after the Third Battle of Ruusan, although Kaan was unaware of the battle there until after Kopecz arrived at Brentaal to inform him.
